Commentary.ab: Y9.7a haōmō aṣ̌auua dūraōšō] Pirart del.
Y9.7c yat̰ hē puϑrō us.zaiiata] Pirart add. post. vīsō puϑrō āϑβiiānōiš. Cf. Yt5.33, 15.23, 17.33, 17.35, 19.36.

Parallels.ab: āat̰ mē aēm paitiiaōxta haōmō aṣ̌auua dūraōšō = Y9.2, Y9.4, Y9.10, Y9.13; ~ VS2.3 āat̰ mē aēm paitiiaōxta yīmō srīrō zaraϑuštra.
haōmō aṣ̌auua dūraōšō = Y11.3; ~ Y11.10 haōma aṣ̌auua dūraōša.
haōmō ... dūraōšō ~ Y9.19 (x3), Y9.20 (x2) haōma jaiδiiemi dūraōša; ~ Y10.21, Y42.5, VrS65.72 haōməm dūraōšəm

maṣ̌iiō astuuaiϑiiāi hunūta gaēϑaiiāi hā aɱāi aṣ̌iš ərənāuui tat̰ aɱāi jasat̰ āiiaptəm = Y9.4, Y9.10, Y9.13; ~ Y9.3, Y9.6, Y9.9, Y9.12 kasə.ϑβąm [...] haōma. maṣ̌iiō astuuaiϑiiāi hunūta gaēϑaiiāi kā aɱāi aṣ̌iš ərənāuui cit̰ aɱāi jasat̰ āiiaptəm
aṣ̌iš ərənāuui ~ 52.3 aṣ̌aiiō ərənauuaṇte; ~ Y56.3 ašōiš ... yā.nə̄ āraēcā ərənauuataēcā ašaŋhāxš.
yat̰ hē puϑrō us.zaiiata = Y9.4; ~ Y9.10 yat̰ hē puϑrō us.zaiiōiϑe; ~ Y9.13 yat̰ hē tūm us.zaiiaŋha.
vīsō sūraiiā̊ ϑraētaōnō = Yt5.33, Yt15.23, Yt17.33, Yt17.35, Yt19.36 vīsō puθrō āθβiiānōiš visō sūraiiā̊ θraētaōnō
